Muglia is just the latest in a raft of executive departures from Microsoft. In October 2010, Steve Ballmer announced the resignation of Chief Software Architect Ray Ozzie , who had helped shape the company's cloud strategy. The CSA role was unique, and I won't refill the role after Ray Ozzie 's departure, Steve Ballmer wrote in an Oct. 18 e-mail to the company.
